description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nCondiments:
The first time an enemy {ACTION_casts} a spell each turn, this creature afflicts enemies with a random debuff. The first time this creature {ACTION_attacks} each turn, it afflicts the target with 2 random debuffs. This trait does not stack.
name: Secret Sauce
